# reset.css

Genuine [Eric Meyer's Reset CSS](http://meyerweb.com/eric/tools/css/reset)
bundled as npm package.

## Installation

```
npm install reset.css --save
```

## Example

When using with [cssnext](http://cssnext.io):

``` css
@import 'reset.css';

html {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

*, *:before, *:after {
  box-sizing: inherit;
}
```
